site.worldDesc: Open new world of possibilities! At least in exclusive tests. Two ideas are forming soon. The end of the antechamber is already here - first in the center and only a short distance to the change of world

rules.intro: By making a donation, you agree to the following rules:
rules.wpReward: You agree that WP is a reward for voluntary donation from private individuals.
rules.voluntarySupport: Donations are funds provided by private individuals without expecting any material goods or services.
rules.expressionOfGratitude: By donating, you acknowledge that it is not a purchase of a product or service but rather a way to express gratitude.
rules.serverMaintenance: To express gratitude, we reward donors in exchange for their support.
rules.finalTransactions: You agree that all transactions made are final and non-refundable.
rules.virtualLoss: In case of loss or theft of virtual property in the game account, no restoration is provided.
rules.title: SUPPORT AND BALANCE

dashboard.repairNotice: CHARACTER WILL BE MOVED TO STARTING LOCATION

downloadHelp.discordServer: JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER, WE WILL DEFINITELY HELP YOU
